scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r images styles js fonts *.html manifest.json dist/
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs dist/js/engine.js -o dist/js/engine.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/js/index.js -o dist/js/index.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/js/options.js -o dist/js/options.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/js/profiles.js -o dist/js/profiles.js -c -m
scripts.minify:css: sass dist/styles/index.css dist/styles/index.css --style=compressed && sass dist/styles/options.css dist/styles/options.css --style=compressed
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r extensity-v${npm_package_version}.zip .
